decision_conditions: <p><span style="margin-bottom:0cm; padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt; text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:12pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,sans-serif">The existing single storey rear extension, by reason of its excessive rearward projection and siting adjacent to the shared boundary, is unduly obtrusive, and is&nbsp;detrimental to the visual and residential amenities of the occupiers of the adjacent property, No 17&nbsp;Buckingham Road, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3.D 7 of The London Plan (2021), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide (2010).</span></span></span><br></p>

<p><span style="font-size:12.0pt">The first floor rear extension, by reason of its excessive rearward projection, and siting in close proximity to No. 17 Buckingham Road gives rise to an overshadowing and overbearing visual impact to the detriment of the residential and visual amenities of the occupiers of this neighbouring property, contrary to Policy D3 (D(7) of The London Plan (2021), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).</span><br></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;text-align:justify;mso-hyphenate:
auto;mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">The first floor rear extension by reason of its excessive scale, bulk and poor design </span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">give rise to a dominant, contrived and incongruous form of development</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">,</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> which subsumes the original dwellinghouse fails to respect its proportions, scale and character.</span> <span style="font-size: 12pt;">The development is therefore contrary to the high quality design aspirations set out in the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3 (D(1) and D(11)) of The London Plan (2021), policy CS1.B on the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Development Management Local Plans Policies (2013) and adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).</span><br></p>
description: First floor rear extension; external alterations (retrospective)
